name.name: Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality

repository_metadata.notes:
Launched as UK PubMed Central (UKPMC) in January 2007, changed to Europe PubMed Central in November 2012.
Special item types include: Links

conditions: Authors must declare at the time of submission that this is a requirement of their institution or funding body, with a link to the relevant open access policy as well as a link to the repository.
